page.shortlink: api client api a5 u array combine method

argument.name: arrayA
argument.description: The array to include the items in.

argument.name: arrayB
argument.description: The array of items to include.

return.name: actions
return.description: The operation preformed on each item in the second array.

property.name: added
property.description: The indexes of the items in the second array that were unique and therefore added to the first.

property.name: skipped
property.description: The indexes of the items in the second array that were not unique and therefore not added to the first.

page.description: Include the unique items from the second array in the first.
